text: Last updated: October 2025 Use the Topic filters or command f to find what you need - if you can't find it or need something else, reach out to MEW, Max, and Neil! Next update: as data comes in Topic Power Stat Source Year Alcoholic Beverages 85% of OT fans enjoy drinking alcohol with their friends Source: Overtime Audience Study on Alcoholic Beverages, Oct 2024 2024 Alcoholic Beverages OT fans are influenced by sports teams and athletes, where they are over 2.5x more likely to try an alcoholic beverage associated with a team or athlete Source: Overtime Audience Study on Alcoholic Beverages, Oct 2024 2024 Alcoholic Beverages OT fans are drinking more: 86% of fans are drinking the same or more than they were a few years ago; OT fans are 1.7x more likely to have 7 or more drinks per week Source: Overtime Audience Study on Alcoholic Beverages, Oct 2024 2024 Alcoholic Beverages OT fans favorite alcoholic beverages are beer (75%), liquor/spirits (73%), and wine (52%) Source: Overtime Audience Study on Alcoholic Beverages, Oct 2024 2024 Alcoholic Beverages 71% of OT fans think that more alcoholic beverage brands should partner with OT Source: Overtime Audience Study on Alcoholic Beverages, Oct 2024 2024 Alcoholic Beverages OT fans are nearly 2x more likely than Gen Pop to participate in Dry January Source: Overtime Audience Study on Alcoholic Beverages, Oct 2024 2024 Alcoholic Beverages OT fans are more likely to drink non-alcoholic alternatives (941 index) Source: Overtime Audience Study on Alcoholic Beverages, Oct 2024 2024 Alcoholic Beverages Over 3 in 4 OT fans think that more beer brands should partner with Overtime Source: Overtime x Knit Custom Brand Lift Study, May 2025 Anime 78% of Overtime viewers on Instagram also engaged with Anime content on the platform Source: Meta Audience Insights, 2023 2023 Auto 95% of OT fans currenly own / lease at least one vehicle Source: Overtime Audience Study on Auto, August 2025 2025 Auto OT fans are more likely than Gen Pop to do research on social media before going to a dealer (165 index) Source: Overtime Audience Study on Auto, August 2025 2025 Auto Female OT fans are 2.7x more likely than Gen Pop to keep up with the latest makeup products and releases Source: Overtime Audience Study on Auto, August 2025 2025 Auto 75% of fans are interested in vehicles with autonomus driving options Source: Overtime Audience Study on Auto, August 2025 2025 Auto 3 in 5 OT fans do as much online research as possible before going to a dealer Source: Overtime Audience Study on Auto, August 2025 2025 Auto 81% of OT fans typically take their car for routine maintenance (rather than reactive maintenance) - popular spots include general repair/service stations and dealerships Source: Overtime Audience Study on Auto, August 2025 2025 Auto 3 in 4 OT fans think that more auto brand should form partnerships with Overtime Source: Overtime Audience Study on Auto, August 2025 2025 Back to School OT fans are nearly 2x more likely to shop online than Gen Pop when back to school shopping Source: Overtime x Knit Proprietary Back to School Research, July 2023 2023 Back to School OT fans are over 2x more likely to want the latest tech when they go back to school, where Apple is the most popular brand for phones & headphones Source: Overtime x Knit Proprietary Back to School Research, July 2023 2023 Betting 82% of OT fans bet on sports at least a few times a month Source: Overtime Audience Study on Sports Betting (A21+ in legal betting states), March 2025 2025 Betting DraftKings and FanDuel are the most popular sportsbooks among OT bettors, followed by ESPN Bet Source: Overtime Audience Study on Sports Betting (A21+ in legal betting states), March 2025 2025 Betting OT fans typically bet on 4 different men's sports and 2 different women's sports, where the NBA, NFL, women's college basketball and women's tennis are most popular Source: Overtime Audience Study on Sports Betting (A21+ in legal betting states), March 2025 2025 Betting Brand reputation & trust is the #1 most important reason why OT fans choose a specific online sportsbook Source: Overtime Audience Study on Sports Betting (A21+ in legal betting states), March 2025 2025 Betting OT fans are 2x more likely to choose an online sportsbook based on its social media presence (195 index) Source: Overtime Audience Study on Sports Betting (A21+ in legal betting states), March 2025 2025 Betting In the last 12 months, OT fans have signed up for or placed a bet with over 4 different sportsbooks Source: Overtime Audience Study on Sports Betting (A21+ in legal betting states), March 2025 2025 Betting OT fans care about the types of bets offered, where over 7 in 10 fans want to see unique offerings or better pricing Source: Overtime Audience Study on Sports Betting (A21+ in legal betting states), March 2025 2025 Betting OT fans are more likely to go to social media to get their sports betting advice (159 index) Source: Overtime Audience Study on Sports Betting (A21+ in legal betting states), March 2025 2025 Boxing Fans 72% of OT fans like or love brands that advertise at a boxing match Source: Overtime x Perksy Proprietary Boxing Research May 2023 2023 Boxing Fans OT boxing fans have strong ad recall for brands that work in boxing: sports betting (83%), alcoholic beverages (74%), and streaming services (61%) Source: Overtime x Perksy Proprietary Boxing Research May 2023 2023 Boxing Fans OT boxing fans love to watch fights (62% stream on ESPN+) and are familiar with current fighters (9 in 10 OT fans are familiar with Ryan Garcia) Source: Overtime x Perksy Proprietary Boxing Research May 2023 2023 Boxing Fans OT boxing fans are also bettors: OT boxing fans are 2.7x more likely to bet on boxing than Gen Pop Source: Overtime x Perksy Proprietary Boxing Research May 2023 2023 Children - Sports 93% of OT parents' children play at least one sport, where (52%), football (47%) and swimming (36%) are most popular Source: Overtime Audience Study on Parenting, February 2024 2024 Coaching OT parents are 4x more likely to coach their child/children in sports than Gen Pop (416 index) Source: Overtime Audience Study on Parenting, February 2024 2024 Cooking 71% of OT fans prefer to cook their meals at home most of the time, where 82% like to try new recipes Source: Overtime Audience Study on Grocery Shopping, September 2024 2024 Cooking OT fans are more likely to meal prep each week as compared to Gen Pop (163 index) Source: Overtime Audience Study on Grocery Shopping, September 2024 2024 Cooking 73% of OT fans use social media for inspiration for their meals & cooking Source: Overtime Audience Study on Grocery Shopping, September 2024 2024 Coffee 75% of OT fans drink coffee several times a week, and 63% say they are drinking more coffee than they were last year Source: Overtime x Perksy Proprietary Coffee/Tea Research Sept 2022 2022 Coffee Starbucks is the most popular shop among OT fans, and 70% of fans are registered for their loyalty program Source: Overtime x Perksy Proprietary Coffee/Tea Research Sept 2022 2022 Cosmetics OT females use an average of 4+ cosmetics products regularly (skin care, hair care, etc.) Source: Overtime x Perksy Proprietary Research, February 2023 2023 Co-viewership 97% of OT parents watch YouTube with their child at least once a week Source: Overtime Audience Study on Parenting, February 2024 2024 Co-viewership 93% of OT parents watch TV / movies on cable TV with their child/children at least once a week Source: Overtime Audience Study on Parenting, February 2024 2024 Co-viewership 91% of OT parents watch TV / movies on streaming services with their child/children at least once a week Source: Overtime Audience Study on Parenting, February 2024 2024 Co-viewership OT parents are 1.5x more likely then Gen Pop to watch live sports on TV or streaming services with their child/children at least once a week Source: Overtime Audience Study on Parenting, February 2024 2024 CPG - Candy 60% of OT fans eat candy at least once a week, where retail stores (81%) and convenience stores (70%) are the top places to purchase Source: Overtime x Perksy Proprietary Candy/Chocolate/Drinks Research November 2023 2023 CPG - Chocolate 61% of OT fans eat chocolate at least once a week, where they are most likely to purchase it at retail stores (77%) or grocery stores (73%) Source: Overtime x Perksy Proprietary Candy/Chocolate/Drinks Research November 2023 2023 CPG - Energy Drinks 35% of OT fans consume an energy drink at least once a day (nearly 2x Gen Pop); over half of OT fans drink energy drinks multiple times a week or more (155 index) Source: Overtime x Perksy Proprietary Research Jan 2023 2023 CPG - Juice 55% of OT fans consume juice at least once a week; OT fans are 1.6x more likely to consume it daily (156 index) Source: Overtime x Perksy Proprietary Candy/Chocolate/Drinks Research November 2023 2023 CPG - Seltzer OT fans are 3x more likely to consume seltzer at least once a day (294 index), either for the taste/flavor or an alternative to water Source: Overtime x Perksy Proprietary Candy/Chocolate/Drinks Research November 2023 2023 CPG - Soda 51% of OT fans consume soda at least once a week, when they have a craving for bubbles/caffeine or something other than water Source: Overtime x Perksy Proprietary Candy/Chocolate/Drinks Research November 2023 2023 CPG - Sports Drinks 30% of OT fans consume sports drinks at least once a week (157 index), typically before or after working out for hydration and recovery purposes Source: Overtime x Perksy Proprietary Candy/Chocolate/Drinks Research November 2023 2023 CTV Viewership In 2024, 14% of Overtime’s YT views are via CTV (136MM views), accounting for 62% of the total watch time (over 16MM hours watched), with an avg watch time of 7:10 Source: YouTube Studio, December 2024 2024 Delivery Apps OT fans are 1.8x more likely to order food via delivery apps or online at least once a week as compared to Gen Pop Source: Overtime x Knit Proprietary QSR / Dining Study, December 2023 2023 Delivery Apps On average, OT fans have used over 3 different delivery apps, where DoorDash (87%), UberEats (78%), and Grubhub (54%) are most popular Source: Overtime x Knit Proprietary QSR / Dining Study, December 2023 2023 Entrepreneurs 75% of OT fans are interested in starting their own business, a 179 index to Gen Pop; additionally, 80% are interested in being their own boss Source: Overtime Audience Study on Finance, October 2025 2025 Environment 76% of OT fans believe that the environment/climate are very important to them Source: Overtime Audience Study 2024 2024 Fashion OT fans are 1.6x more likely to get their fashion inspiration from social media, and 2.2x more likely from famous people, such as celebs, athletes, and influencers Source: Overtime Audience Study on Apparel & Sneakers, 2024 2024 Fashion OT fans are nearly 2x more likely than Gen Pop to keep up with the latest fashion trends Source: Overtime Audience Study on Apparel & Sneakers, 2024 2024 Finance 80% of OT fans manage their own finances, where 79% want to take control of their spending habits Source: Overtime Audience Study on Finance, October 2025 2025 Finance OT fans top financial goals include improving their credit score (47%), saving money for retirement (39%) and trading/investing their money (34%) Source: Overtime Audience Study on Finance, October 2025 2025 Finance 98% of OT fans use a credit card, where the most important factors include cashback rewards (51%), low interest rates (49%) and points rewards (49%) Source: Overtime Audience Study on Finance, October 2025 2025 Finance OT fans are 3x more likely than Gen Pop to go to social media when they have questions about finance Source: Overtime Audience Study on Finance, October 2025 2025 Gamers 75% of OT fans consider themselves to be gamers, which is +22% more likely than Gen Pop Source: Overtime x Perksy Proprietary Gaming Research, December 2023 2023 Gamers 93% of OT fans currently own a gaming device, where the top devices include the Nintendo Switch (59%), Playstation 5 (54%), and Playstation 4 (41%) Source: Overtime x Perksy Proprietary Gaming Research, December 2023 2023 Gamers - Mobile 80% of OT fans engage in mobile gaming activities at least a few times a week Source: Overtime x Perksy Proprietary Gaming Research, December 2023 2023 Gamers - Console 79% of OT fans play video games on a console at least a few times a week Source: Overtime x Perksy Proprietary Gaming Research, December 2023 2023 Grooming Over half of Male OT fans use beard care and oils as well as razors several times a week Source: Overtime Audience Study on Personal Care, May 2025 2025 Grooming 1 in 3 Male OT fans get their grooming inspiration from influencers and athletes (210 index) Source: Overtime Audience Study on Personal Care, May 2025 2025 Health OT fans are 2x more likely to consider themselves to be "very healthy" as compared to Gen Pop; 8 in 10 OT fans (79%) consider themselves to be healthy Source: Overtime Audience Study on Candy/Chocolate/Drinks November 2023 2023 Health 76% of OT fans say that eating healthy is important to them Source: Overtime Audience Study on Vitamins / Health, 2024 2024 Holiday 90% of OT fans prefer shopping online, where they are 3x more likely to shop via social media as compared to Gen Pop Source: Overtime Audience Study on Holiday Shopping, 2024 2024 Influencers OT fans are nearly 4x more likely to be considered influential among their friends and/or on social media (375 index) Source: Overtime Audience Study 2024 2024 Investing OT fans are 2x more likely to invest their money, where 95% of OT fans currently invest their money or plan to in the future Source: Overtime Audience Study on Finance, April 2024 2024 Makeup Female OT fans are 2.7x more likely than Gen Pop to keep up with the latest makeup products and releases Source: Overtime Audience Study on Personal Care, May 2025 2025 Makeup 76% of Female OT fans use makeup several times a week Source: Overtime Audience Study on Personal Care, May 2025 2025 Mental Health 89% of OT fans believe that mental health is very or extremely important Source: Overtime Audience Study, January 2024 2024 Mobile Payment Apps 99% of OT fans use at least one mobile payment app, where the most popular ones are PayPal (80%), Cash App (64%) and Apple Pay (52%) Source: Overtime Audience Study on Finance, April 2024 2024 Music 94% of OT fans listen to music more than once a week, where Spotify is the top platform (56%, 135 index) Source: Overtime Audience Study on Streaming 2024 2024 Performance Supplements OT fans are over 8x more likely to use performance supplements than Gen Pop (816 index) Source: Overtime Audience Study on Vitamins / Health, 2024 2024 Personal Care 72% of OT fans influence their friends and family on which personal care brands and products they should use (155 index) Source: Overtime Audience Study on Personal Care, May 2025 2025 Personal Care The most commonly used personal care products amongst OT fans include skincare, face, and dental products Source: Overtime Audience Study on Personal Care, May 2025 2025 Personal Hygiene 88% of OT fans say that personal hygiene is important to them Source: Overtime Audience Study on Vitamins / Health, 2024 2024 Pet ownership 82% of OT fans own a pet, where 79% of pet-owners own a dog and 53% of pet-owners own a cat Source: Overtime x Perksy Proprietary Research August 2023 2023 Protein Powders OT fans are 3x more likely to use protein powders as compared to Gen Pop (302 index) Source: Overtime Audience Study on Vitamins / Health, 2024 2024 Podcasts 68% of OT fans are listening to podcasts more this year than last year, a 170 index to Gen Pop Source: Overtime x Perksy Proprietary Research Feb 2023 2023 Podcasts 60% of OT fans listen to podcasts at least a few times per week, where more than half prefer to consume then as both video & audio rather than just audio Source: Overtime x Perksy Proprietary Research Feb 2023 2023 QSR 70% of OT fans eat at fast food restaurants at least once a week (152 index) Source: Overtime x Knit Proprietary QSR / Dining Study, December 2023 2023 QSR OT fans are 2x more likely to dine/purchase from a fast food restaurant after seeing an ad from them; 87% of OT fans visit the restaurant within the next month Source: Overtime x Knit Proprietary QSR / Dining Study, December 2023 2023 QSR / Dining When choosing where to dine, OT fans are nearly 6x more likely to be influenced by a restaurant's partnership with sports leagues and/or athletes; 61% are likely to visit it Source: Overtime x Knit Proprietary QSR / Dining Study, December 2023 2023 QSR / Dining When choosing where to dine, OT fans are 3.5x more likely to be influenced by a restaurant's partnership on social media and/or with influencers; 60% likely to visit it Source: Overtime x Knit Proprietary QSR / Dining Study, December 2023 2023 QSR / Dining 73% of OT fans eat at sit-down restaurants at least a few times a month Source: Overtime x Knit Proprietary QSR / Dining Study, December 2023 2023 QSR / Dining 79% of OT fans are likely to try out a limited-time-offering at a restaurant Source: Overtime x Knit Proprietary QSR / Dining Study, December 2023 2023 QSR / Dining 71% of OT fans are likely to join a loyalty program for a restaurant (139 index) Source: Overtime x Knit Proprietary QSR / Dining Study, December 2023 2023 QSR / Dining 60% of OT fans are likely to look for a healthier option on a menu Source: Overtime x Knit Proprietary QSR / Dining Study, December 2023 2023 QSR / Dining When watching sports, OT fans prefer finger foods, where chicken wings are most popular, followed by pizza & nachos Source: Overtime Custom Brand Lift Study, March 2024 2024 Social Media Usage On average, OT fans use 4+ social media platforms daily, which is over 2x as many as Gen Pop Source: Overtime Audience Study January 2024 2024 Shopping Habits 7 in 10 OT fans shop online or in person at least once a week Source: Overtime Audience Study on Shopping, 2025 2025 Shopping Habits OT fans are more likely to shop via social media at least once a week (166 index) Source: Overtime Audience Study on Shopping, 2025 2025 Shopping Habits 3 in 5 OT fans look to social media for inspiration for what to shop for Source: Overtime Audience Study on Shopping, 2025 2025 Sleep 85% of OT fans say that sleep is important to them, where over 60% get at least 7 hours of sleep per night Source: Overtime Audience Study on Vitamins / Health, 2024 2024 Snacks OT fans are frequent snackers, with 84% shopping for them multiple times a week; fruit and vegetables are most popular (9 in 10 consume multiple times a week) Overtime Audience Study on Snacks, 2024 2024 Snacks 88% of OT fans enjoy consuming snacks while watching sports (166 index) Overtime Audience Study on Snacks, 2024 2024 Snacks The most important factors when choosing a snack are taste (98%), quality (93%), and quantity (86%) Overtime Audience Study on Snacks, 2024 2024 Sneakerheads OT fans are 1.6x more likely to consider themselves sneakerheads (163 index) Source: Overtime Audience Study on Apparel & Sneakers, 2024 2024 Streaming OT fans subscribe/use over 5 streaming services on average, where Netflix is most popular Source: Overtime Audience Study on Streaming 2024 2024 Streaming 87% of OT fans watch TV shows or movies on streaming services more than once a week Source: Overtime Audience Study on Streaming 2024 2024 Streaming 85% of OT fans watch or stream YouTube more than once a week Source: Overtime Audience Study on Streaming 2024 2024 Streaming OT fans are 2.2x more likely to watch live sports on streaming more than once a week (72% do so) Source: Overtime Audience Study on Streaming 2024 2024 Streaming 85% of OT fans are likely to watch sports highlights on cable TV, YouTube or streaming services (167 index) Source: Overtime Audience Study on Streaming 2024 2024 Streaming (influence) 82% of OT fans are likely to recommend shows and movies to their family and friends Source: Overtime Audience Study on Streaming 2024 2024 Streaming 75% of OT fans are likely to consume content about TV shows & movies on social media Source: Overtime Audience Study on Streaming 2024 2024 Tech Phones are the most common tech product used by OT fans (90% use it frequently), followed by headphones (73%) Source: Overtime Audience Study on Tech 2025 2025 Telco 75% of OT fans have their own cellphone plan and pay for it themselves; T-Mobile (33%), Verizon (24%), & AT&T (20%) are most popular Source: Overtime Audience Study on Telco 2024 2024 Telco Of the 21% of OT fans on their family cellphone plan, 2/3 of OT fans pay for their portion of the plan themselves Source: Overtime Audience Study on Telco 2024 2024 Telco When deciding whether to get their own cellphone plan, 44% of OT fans are influenced by cost-effectiveness (price, discounts/deals, cost-saving bundles) Source: Overtime Audience Study on Telco 2024 2024 Ticketing 91% of OT fans find about tickets to events on social media Source: Overtime x Perksy Proprietary Ticketing Research June 2023 2023 Ticketing 89% of OT fans check more than one website when comparing ticket prices for an event Source: Overtime x Perksy Proprietary Ticketing Research June 2023 2023 Travel 4 in 5 OT fans travel for leisure at least every few months, and nearly 1 in 2 travel for business at least once a month Source: Overtime Audience Study on Travel November 2024 2024 Travel 68% of OT fans plan to travel more next year than this year, where over 60% prefer to travel to new destinations rather than returning to the same destinations Source: Overtime Audience Study on Travel November 2024 2024 Travel Nearly 3 in 4 OT fans plan their trips less than a month in advance, where they are +37% more likely to do so than Gen Pop Source: Overtime Audience Study on Travel November 2024 2024 Travel 63% of OT fans look to social media for travel inspiration Source: Overtime Audience Study on Travel November 2024 2024 Travel OT fans are over 2.4x more likely to travel via airplane at least every few months, where the top airlines are American (56%), United (51%) and Delta (48%) Source: Overtime Audience Study on Travel November 2024 2024 Travel Hotels are the #1 location where OT fans stay when they travel, where popular brands include Hilton (62%), Marriott (58%) and Best Western (34%) Source: Overtime Audience Study on Travel November 2024 2024 Values 91% of OT fans state that human rights are very or extremely important to them Source: Overtime Audience Study January 2024 2024 Values OT fans are 1.5x more likely to state that racial justice is important to them as compared to Gen Pop, with 85% agree that racial justice is very/extremely important Source: Overtime Audience Study January 2024 2024 Values OT fans are 1.6x more likely to state that gender equality is important to them as compared to Gen Pop Source: Overtime Audience Study January 2024 2024 Vitamins 66% of OT fans take vitamins or vitamin supplements, the #1 type of nutritional product/supplement that OT fans take (ahead of protein and energy snacks/powder) Source: Overtime Audience Study on Vitamins / Health, 2024 2024 Workout 68% of OT fans workout at a gym at least once a week, which is a 273 index to Gen Pop Source: Overtime Audience Study on Vitamins / Health, 2024 2024 Workout Over half of OT fans attend workout classes at least once a month (324 index to Gen Pop) Source: Overtime Audience Study on Vitamins / Health, 2024 2024

Last updated: October 2025Use the Topic filters or command f to find what you need - if you can't find it or need something else, reach out to MEW, Max, and Neil!
Next update: as data comes in
TopicPower StatSourceYear
Alcoholic Beverages85% of OT fans enjoy drinking alcohol with their friendsSource: Overtime Audience Study on Alcoholic Beverages, Oct 20242024
Alcoholic BeveragesOT fans are influenced by sports teams and athletes, where they are over 2.5x more likely to try an alcoholic beverage associated with a team or athleteSource: Overtime Audience Study on Alcoholic Beverages, Oct 20242024
Alcoholic BeveragesOT fans are drinking more: 86% of fans are drinking the same or more than they were a few years ago; OT fans are 1.7x more likely to have 7 or more drinks per weekSource: Overtime Audience Study on Alcoholic Beverages, Oct 20242024
Alcoholic BeveragesOT fans favorite alcoholic beverages are beer (75%), liquor/spirits (73%), and wine (52%)Source: Overtime Audience Study on Alcoholic Beverages, Oct 20242024
Alcoholic Beverages71% of OT fans think that more alcoholic beverage brands should partner with OTSource: Overtime Audience Study on Alcoholic Beverages, Oct 20242024
Alcoholic BeveragesOT fans are nearly 2x more likely than Gen Pop to participate in Dry JanuarySource: Overtime Audience Study on Alcoholic Beverages, Oct 20242024
Alcoholic BeveragesOT fans are more likely to drink non-alcoholic alternatives (941 index)Source: Overtime Audience Study on Alcoholic Beverages, Oct 20242024
Alcoholic BeveragesOver 3 in 4 OT fans think that more beer brands should partner with OvertimeSource: Overtime x Knit Custom Brand Lift Study, May 2025
Anime78% of Overtime viewers on Instagram also engaged with Anime content on the platformSource: Meta Audience Insights, 20232023
Auto95% of OT fans currenly own / lease at least one vehicleSource: Overtime Audience Study on Auto, August 20252025
AutoOT fans are more likely than Gen Pop to do research on social media before going to a dealer (165 index)Source: Overtime Audience Study on Auto, August 20252025
AutoFemale OT fans are 2.7x more likely than Gen Pop to keep up with the latest makeup products and releasesSource: Overtime Audience Study on Auto, August 20252025
Auto75% of fans are interested in vehicles with autonomus driving optionsSource: Overtime Audience Study on Auto, August 20252025
Auto3 in 5 OT fans do as much online research as possible before going to a dealerSource: Overtime Audience Study on Auto, August 20252025
Auto81% of OT fans typically take their car for routine maintenance (rather than reactive maintenance) - popular spots include general repair/service stations and dealershipsSource: Overtime Audience Study on Auto, August 20252025
Auto3 in 4 OT fans think that more auto brand should form partnerships with OvertimeSource: Overtime Audience Study on Auto, August 20252025
Back to SchoolOT fans are nearly 2x more likely to shop online than Gen Pop when back to school shoppingSource: Overtime x Knit Proprietary Back to School Research, July 20232023
Back to SchoolOT fans are over 2x more likely to want the latest tech when they go back to school, where Apple is the most popular brand for phones & headphonesSource: Overtime x Knit Proprietary Back to School Research, July 20232023
Betting82% of OT fans bet on sports at least a few times a monthSource: Overtime Audience Study on Sports Betting (A21+ in legal betting states), March 20252025
BettingDraftKings and FanDuel are the most popular sportsbooks among OT bettors, followed by ESPN BetSource: Overtime Audience Study on Sports Betting (A21+ in legal betting states), March 20252025
BettingOT fans typically bet on 4 different men's sports and 2 different women's sports, where the NBA, NFL, women's college basketball and women's tennis are most popularSource: Overtime Audience Study on Sports Betting (A21+ in legal betting states), March 20252025
BettingBrand reputation & trust is the #1 most important reason why OT fans choose a specific online sportsbookSource: Overtime Audience Study on Sports Betting (A21+ in legal betting states), March 20252025
BettingOT fans are 2x more likely to choose an online sportsbook based on its social media presence (195 index)Source: Overtime Audience Study on Sports Betting (A21+ in legal betting states), March 20252025
BettingIn the last 12 months, OT fans have signed up for or placed a bet with over 4 different sportsbooksSource: Overtime Audience Study on Sports Betting (A21+ in legal betting states), March 20252025
BettingOT fans care about the types of bets offered, where over 7 in 10 fans want to see unique offerings or better pricingSource: Overtime Audience Study on Sports Betting (A21+ in legal betting states), March 20252025
BettingOT fans are more likely to go to social media to get their sports betting advice (159 index)Source: Overtime Audience Study on Sports Betting (A21+ in legal betting states), March 20252025
Boxing Fans72% of OT fans like or love brands that advertise at a boxing matchSource: Overtime x Perksy Proprietary Boxing Research May 20232023
Boxing FansOT boxing fans have strong ad recall for brands that work in boxing: sports betting (83%), alcoholic beverages (74%), and streaming services (61%)Source: Overtime x Perksy Proprietary Boxing Research May 20232023
Boxing FansOT boxing fans love to watch fights (62% stream on ESPN+) and are familiar with current fighters (9 in 10 OT fans are familiar with Ryan Garcia)Source: Overtime x Perksy Proprietary Boxing Research May 20232023
Boxing FansOT boxing fans are also bettors: OT boxing fans are 2.7x more likely to bet on boxing than Gen PopSource: Overtime x Perksy Proprietary Boxing Research May 20232023
Children - Sports93% of OT parents' children play at least one sport, where (52%), football (47%) and swimming (36%) are most popularSource: Overtime Audience Study on Parenting, February 20242024
CoachingOT parents are 4x more likely to coach their child/children in sports than Gen Pop (416 index)Source: Overtime Audience Study on Parenting, February 20242024
Cooking71% of OT fans prefer to cook their meals at home most of the time, where 82% like to try new recipesSource: Overtime Audience Study on Grocery Shopping, September 20242024
CookingOT fans are more likely to meal prep each week as compared to Gen Pop (163 index)Source: Overtime Audience Study on Grocery Shopping, September 20242024
Cooking73% of OT fans use social media for inspiration for their meals & cookingSource: Overtime Audience Study on Grocery Shopping, September 20242024
Coffee75% of OT fans drink coffee several times a week, and 63% say they are drinking more coffee than they were last yearSource: Overtime x Perksy Proprietary Coffee/Tea Research Sept 20222022
CoffeeStarbucks is the most popular shop among OT fans, and 70% of fans are registered for their loyalty programSource: Overtime x Perksy Proprietary Coffee/Tea Research Sept 20222022
CosmeticsOT females use an average of 4+ cosmetics products regularly (skin care, hair care, etc.)Source: Overtime x Perksy Proprietary Research, February 20232023
Co-viewership97% of OT parents watch YouTube with their child at least once a weekSource: Overtime Audience Study on Parenting, February 20242024
Co-viewership93% of OT parents watch TV / movies on cable TV with their child/children at least once a weekSource: Overtime Audience Study on Parenting, February 20242024
Co-viewership91% of OT parents watch TV / movies on streaming services with their child/children at least once a weekSource: Overtime Audience Study on Parenting, February 20242024
